main event: A burning object was observed descending with a jagged trail, followed by an explosion in color. The object then displayed varying colors and a changing shape.
interesting points: The object was not solid, but the shape and colors were constantly changing and dimming.
The object seemed to be gaining altitude and sailing swiftly away, before disappearing after a few seconds.
The speed of the object was a little slower than a meteorite, and it had a peculiar circling motion under a bright light.
Two women and a man who were picked up hitchhiking also reported seeing the object when they were in Kentucky.
The witness was not a sky watcher and did not imagine he had seen anything more than routine aircraft, but noted the bright lights would distract observation for people living in cities.
sighted object: a burning object with a jagged trail, followed by an object with varying colors and changing shape
